{{Description|A small frog that often appears in wetlands.<br />This animal is very common in wetland areas, and its body secretes a mysterious sticky substance that has much medicinal utility.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Frog''' is a type of creature. It can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Frog (Material)|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
